body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting us today. My name is Brandon Thomas and I'm a Customer Service Representative at Safe Wheels Car Dealership. May I know your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Janice! Could you please provide me with your phone number and email address so we can assist you better?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my phone number is five five five, six seven eight, nine one two three, and my email address is j.harris@example.com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Janice. Could you also confirm your home address for verification purposes?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, my address is two three four Maple Street, apartment five six seven, Cityville, Stateville, Zipcode: one two three four five.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing your information, Janice. We appreciate your cooperation.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm really excited to get help with my inquiry!

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: That's great to hear! We will do our best to assist you. Thank you for your time, Janice.
